dashboard-a.description: Progress ring dashboard with weekly chart and activity list

dashboard-b.description: Hero banner with donut chart and horizontal scroll cards

dashboard-c.description: Search-first with scrolling pills and category progress bars

list-a.description: Search + filter chips with icon row items

detail-a.description: Hero gradient header with stats and related items

form-a.description: Clean glass inputs with tags and toggle

profile-a.description: Avatar with gradient border, stats row, settings list

auth-login.description: Login screen with email/password, forgot password link, signup redirect

auth-signup.description: Signup screen with name/email/password, login redirect

auth-forgot.description: Forgot password screen with email input

list-functional.description: Dynamic list bound to collection with loading/empty/error states, pagination

form-functional.description: Form bound to collection with validation, error handling, submit
